languages.text: {n}Маражай поднимает брови в притворном изумлении.{/n} "Разве не ты сам{mf||а} выбрал{mf||а} то, что больше всего жаждет твоя душа?"
{n}Marazhai raises his eyebrows in feigned confusion.{/n} "Did you yourself not choose that which your soul craves the most?"
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай поднимает брови в притворном изумлении.{/n} "Разве не ты сам{mf||а} выбрал{mf||а} то, что больше всего жаждет твоя душа?"

{n}Marazhai raises his eyebrows in feigned confusion.{/n} "Did you yourself not choose that which your soul craves the most?"

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋故作困惑地扬起了眉毛。{/n}“莫非你选择的礼物，并不是你的灵魂最渴望的东西？”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai raises his eyebrows in feigned confusion.{/n} "Did you yourself not choose that which your soul craves the most?"

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋故作困惑地扬起了眉毛。{/n}“莫非你选择的礼物，并不是你的灵魂最渴望的东西？”

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは、困惑したとでも言う風に眉を上げた。{/n}「お前自ら、魂が一番に求めるものを選ばなかったんだろう？」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai raises his eyebrows in feigned confusion.{/n} "Did you yourself not choose that which your soul craves the most?"

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは、困惑したとでも言う風に眉を上げた。{/n}「お前自ら、魂が一番に求めるものを選ばなかったんだろう？」

languages.text: {n}Marazhai enarca las cejas fingiendo confusión.{/n} «¿No elegiste tú {mf|mismo|misma} lo que tu alma ansiaba por encima de todo?».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai raises his eyebrows in feigned confusion.{/n} "Did you yourself not choose that which your soul craves the most?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai enarca las cejas fingiendo confusión.{/n} «¿No elegiste tú {mf|mismo|misma} lo que tu alma ansiaba por encima de todo?».

languages.text: {n}Marazhai hausse les sourcils d'un air faussement confus.{/n} « N'avez-vous pas vous-même choisi ce que votre âme désire plus que tout ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai raises his eyebrows in feigned confusion.{/n} "Did you yourself not choose that which your soul craves the most?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai hausse les sourcils d'un air faussement confus.{/n} « N'avez-vous pas vous-même choisi ce que votre âme désire plus que tout ? »

languages.text: {n}Marazhai hebt scheinbar verwirrt seine Augenbrauen.{/n} "Habt Ihr Euch nicht etwa selbst dafür entschieden, wonach sich Eure Seele am meisten sehnt?"
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai raises his eyebrows in feigned confusion.{/n} "Did you yourself not choose that which your soul craves the most?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai hebt scheinbar verwirrt seine Augenbrauen.{/n} "Habt Ihr Euch nicht etwa selbst dafür entschieden, wonach sich Eure Seele am meisten sehnt?"

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, yapmacık bir kafa karışıklığıyla kaşlarını kaldırıyor.{/n} "Ruhunun en çok arzuladığı şeyi kendin seçmedin mi?"
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai raises his eyebrows in feigned confusion.{/n} "Did you yourself not choose that which your soul craves the most?"
